name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 10
description:
Spend a sensational Summer helping the Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & Jurassic Springs National Parks.

Become a Volunteer Ranger. Organise events on beautiful lakes, rivers and trails. Ride Pinecreek’s awesome new Aerial Tramway. Learn about Renewable Energy Sources. Camp and Picnic beside Bluewaters Lake, explore atmospheric Waterfalls, Caves, enchanted Gorges and Gorgeous outdoor locations. Enjoy fabulous scenery, have Campfires, spot Bears, Deer and Eagles. See Pinecreek’s historic buildings and landmarks. Dig for Dinosaurs in Jurassic Springs NP.

Spot 100’s of Animals, Birds, Fish and other Wildlife. Check everything out in a wonderfully illustrated Wildlife Notebook. Protect the environment and get souvenirs and awards as you go along.

Play great Hogs & Puzzles, Spot 100’s of Animals, Birds, Fish and Wildlife. Protect the environment, get Souvenirs and Awards along the way.
